textBeforeTable: Links to notes for each release You can also have a look at the list of all bug fixes of Firebug 1.11. RTL character doesn't break HTML Panel display Break On XHR works as expected Box model shading works after iframe reload Extensions don't break Location Menu anymore Inspection doesn't jump around Firebug gets closed when browser popup window is closed Start Button Infotip is correctly reflecting the panel states Cookies at root level are shown Copy/Paste work in Layout Side Panel Pressing Esc doesn't let CSS properties disappear Global completions respect cd() Help command works on Mac OS and Linux/Unix Console logging from iframes is working correctly Firebug can be opened in popop windows Disabling Firebug doesn't break Firefox UI Source link is shown for CSS errors HTML
textAfterTable: Firebug 1.10 This release is the current stable version. Blog posts: Firebug 1.10 announcement Firebug 1.10 Feature Highlights Overview of Firebug 1.10 Firebug Roadmap 1.10 Features and changes Console and Command Line Open AJAX response in a new tab The Command Editor uses Orion, allowing syntax highlighting monitorEvents() and unmonitorEvents() work like in Chrome allowing event groups and arrays with of events Completion List Popup can be opened via Ctrl/⌘+Space Page Up / Up, Home, End and mouse wheel can be used to scroll the Completion List Popup Case-insensitive auto-completion for Command Line Better default completions help command added Selections in Command Editor are executed Cookie events display control in Console Panel HTML
